thread.title: Bomb attack in progress in front of the Grand Hyatt Hotel Denver, Colorado?
thread.title_full: Bomb attack in progress in front of the Grand Hyatt Hotel Denver, Colorado?

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Bomb attack in progress in front of the Grand Hyatt Hotel Denver, Colorado?
text:
Bomb attack in progress in front of the Grand Hyatt Hotel Denver, Colorado?   10, 2015 eTN   
The incident began Friday night at around 10:45 p.m. near the Colorado Convention Center. 
It's a busy Friday late night in Denver, Colorado. The Denver Police Department is currently responding to a bomb scare on 14th & Welton in Denver in front of the Grand Hyatt Hotel. 
The luxury hotel in Denver has been isolated by yellow ribbon police lines. If the hotel is being evacuated is currently unknown. 
A car parked in front of the hotel caused Denver police to respond with force and raised a suspicion of a possible bomb attack in progress. 
Denver Police tweeted updates would be made available as soon as possible.
